channel.title: Looking for a hoster with very basic coding skills
channel.description:
looking for a hoster! for a very amazing server (you must be able to do very basic coding also) pm me here or on skype : xxalexxxx88, if you choose to host/code you will get 100% ALL of the servers donations!
regards, Alex

item.title: Looking for a hoster with very basic coding skills
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

This isn’t allowed. For a couple reasons, firstly, you can’t request a programmer/hoster, or whatever it is you want, next, this is the wrong section if you’re looking to start a team.
